title: Isekai Shokudou (Restaurant to Another World)
synopsis: Western Restaurant Nekoya is a popular eatery located on a street corner in a Tokyo shopping district. Serving both traditional Japanese fare as well as Western dishes, this eating establishment is popular among Tokyo's residents. But this seemingly ordinary restaurant is also popular with another type of clientele...
voices: ['Suwabe, Junichi', 'Uesaka, Sumire', 'Oonishi, Saori', 'Itou, Shizuka', 'Ueda, Reina', 'Tamura, Yukari', 'Hikasa, Youko', 'Yasuno, Kiyono', 'Hiyama, Nobuyuki', 'Konishi, Katsuyuki']
